name: Justice & Diversity Center of the Bar Association of San Francisco
description: Justice & Diversity Center has three main programs, two of which provide legal services. The Diversity Education Program includes such components as School to College for high school students, and the Minority Scholarship Program for law students. They also provide Immigrant Legal Defense Program. The Homeless Advocacy Project provides legal services to individuals and families who are homeless or at imminent risk of homelessness Through the JDC, volunteer attorneys, paralegals, law students and
